name: BluEntBIM
overview:
BluEnt LLC provides outsourced computer aided design (CAD) drafting services for residential and light commercial construction industries. Where possible, BluEnt seeks to deploy innovative technologies and methods including Building Information Modeling (link), Integrated Project Delivery (link) and Global Work share Systems. It offers technology-based services, including drafting, production of construction documents, and photo-realistic renderings for architects, homebuilders, engineers, and others who use CAD software.
BluEnt has completed more than 1500 projects in various countries ranging from single family homes to high-rise office buildings and complexes, mixed- use developments and major university, municipal and hospitality projects successfully. Specialties Design and Construction Documentation support, Building Information Modeling, Architecture, Engineering, Rendering, CAD Drafting
